steps.title: Prep the Rice
instructions: Ensure the rice is cold and clump-free. If using freshly cooked rice, spread it on a plate and place it in the refrigerator for a few hours to cool down.

steps.title: Cook the Chicken
instructions: Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a large pan or wok over medium-high heat. Add the diced chicken breast, season with a little salt and pepper, and cook until browned and cooked through. Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside.

steps.title: Scramble the Eggs
instructions: Reduce the heat to medium. In the same pan, add the beaten eggs and scramble until fully cooked. Remove the eggs from the pan and chop them into small pieces.

steps.title: Sauté the Vegetables
instructions: Add the remaining tablespoon of vegetable oil to the pan. Sauté the diced carrot for about 2 minutes, then add the peas and cook for an additional minute.

steps.title: Combine Ingredients
instructions: Increase the heat to medium-high. Add the cooked rice to the pan with the vegetables. Stir-fry for a few minutes until the rice is heated through. Then, add the cooked chicken and scrambled eggs back into the pan.

steps.title: Season
instructions: Pour the soy sauce and sesame oil over the rice mixture. Stir everything together and cook for another 2-3 minutes. Taste and adjust the seasoning with more soy sauce, salt, or pepper if needed.

steps.title: Garnish and Serve
instructions: Transfer the fried rice to a serving dish. Garnish with sliced green onions. Serve hot with a wedge of lime on the side.
